structure.unit: PUBLIC PRINTING AND DISTRIBUTION OF PUBLIC DOCUMENTS

law.catch_line: Purchase and distribution of bound volumes and advance sheets of opinions of Supreme Court and Court of Appeals.
law.text: The state law librarian, under direction of the Supreme Court, shall purchase bound volumes and advance sheets of the opinions of the Supreme Court and Court of Appeals and furnish them for the use of the Supreme Court, Court of Appeals, each county law library, and each judge of a Circuit Court.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 16, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 17. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2426, 2426a, 2426b.
